                     col_names = c("direction", "value"))

# Part 1

```{r part1}
input2 %>%
  mutate(
    ymove=case_when(
      direction=="down"~value,
      direction=="up"~-value,
      TRUE ~ 0
    ),
    xmove=case_when(
      direction=="forward"~value,
      TRUE ~ 0
    )
  ) %>%
  summarise(
    depth=sum(ymove),
    horiz=sum(xmove)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    res=depth*horiz
  )
```
